definitions.definition: A resinous gum from the stem and roots of Ferula species such as Ferula foetida and Ferula assa-foetida , having a strong , unpleasant smell , with culinary and medical uses .

main_definition: A resinous gum from the stem and roots of Ferula species such as Ferula foetida and Ferula assa-foetida , having a strong , unpleasant smell , with culinary and medical uses . [from 14th c.]
